title: Sukina Ko ni Furareta ga, Kouhai Joshi kara “Senpai, Watashi ja dame desu ka…?” To Iwareta Ken - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Romance   School Life   Shounen   Slice of Life
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Love at First Sight   Love Triangles   Male Protagonist   Modern Day
author: Yuzumoto Haruto   柚本悠斗
description:
It was right after I entered high school—
I, Ayano Muguchi, saw the boy I've always had a crush on, Naruse Narumi, fall in love for the first time.
As soon as I was depressed, Narumi asked me to support him in his love ......, but I thought this was my chance.
I decided to take advantage of my position as an advisor to close the distance between me and Narumi-senpai and aim for a side love affair.
My way of doing things may be cunning. But I can't pretend to be something I'm not if I want to be with the person I love.
I'll make him fall in love with me before Narumi's first love comes true.>
